title: PropFind 404 error after successful MkCol
description: The issue suggests a potential problem with caching. Note: This scenario resembles issue 21288, which was fixed ('DirContext caching problem with Dreamweaver 6 when recursively creating directories'). The problem can be replicated using a jackrabbit client as follows:
OB: Performing a PropFind call on a resource results in a 404 error when executed after a MkCol operation for the same resource.
EB: The PropFind call should successfully retrieve the resource after a preceding MkCol operation on the same resource.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Use an HttpClient with the following steps:
   a. Make a PropFind request on a new directory ('newDir') via 'http://localhost:8080/webdav/output/' with a unique identifier.
   b. Comment out the request from step 'a' to ensure the success of the second PropFind request.
   c. Execute a MkCol request on 'newDir'.
   d. Perform a PropFind request on 'newDir'.
2. Observe the 404 error in the PropFind request.
